attributes.action: Tell us if John Kerry used an expense account to buy chocolates for his wife, as our electeds are allowed to.
attributes.additional_details: Surely, the yanks MUST be able to charge such purchases to the UK taxpayer, we seem to be liable for most of the spending going on anywhere on the planet - EXCEPT, OF COURSE, THAT OUR TAXPAYER POUNDS CAN NEVER BE SPENT ON THE TAXPAYERS OF THIS COUNTRY.
